items.question: What is the song played at the end of the episode "Dinner Party?"
items.answer: "Game of Pricks" by Guided by Voices.Roy is shown to be a fan of this band. In the episode "Tramps Like Us," Jen claims that she has now heard every one of their songs thanks to Roy. According to gbvdb.com, this is more than 1,800 songs.

items.question: Is the laughter canned or from an audience?
items.answer: Every thing that is shot in the studio is filmed live in front of an audience. The scenes that are shot on location are shown to the the live audience and then the laughter is recorded.The directors and actors gauge their the show and performance on the laughter. Often something looks great and hilarious on paper but then it doesn't go over so well with an audience.

items.question: What is the comic that Roy reads throughout Season 1?
items.answer: "Twentieth Century Eightball" by Daniel Clowes (creator of Ghost World). He can be seen in the image on his Wikipedia page holding a copy. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Clowes
